org.example

Class FullGtfsMerger

  • Object
    • org.example.FullGtfsMerger

  • public class FullGtfsMerger
extends Object
    FullGtfsMerger handles merging multiple GTFS feed folders into a single output folder.

    • Method Detail

      • mergeAllFeeds

        public boolean mergeAllFeeds(String rootFolder,
                             String outputFolder,
                             String headerChoice)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException
        Merges all GTFS feed folders into a single output folder.
        Parameters:
        rootFolder - Path to the main folder containing GTFS feed subfolders.
        outputFolder - Path to the folder where merged GTFS files will be saved.
        headerChoice - Determines how the reference header is chosen: - "long" → Choose the header with the most columns. - "short" → Choose the header with the fewest columns.
        Returns:
        true if merging is successful, false if no feeds found or invalid configuration.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If file reading/writing fails.
        com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException - If CSV format is invalid.

      • mergeFileIfExists

        private void mergeFileIfExists(java.io.File[] feedDirs,
                               String outputFolder,
                               String fileName,
                               String headerChoice)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException
        Performs the merge operation for a specific file if it exists in any feed folder.
        Parameters:
        feedDirs - Array of feed folder paths to check for the file.
        outputFolder - Path of the folder where the merged file will be saved.
        fileName - Name of the file to merge (e.g., "agency.txt").
        headerChoice - Header type to use in the merged file; "long" or "short".
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading or writing files.
        com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException - If there is a problem reading CSV data.
